content.body: (that is to say, yes, we will need some sort of keyword to distinguish pattern-matching from destructuring in contexts like variable assignment, when we add pattern matching there. but that's not connected to the question of how irrefutable matchers are spelled, afaict?)
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: (that is to say, yes, we will need some sort of keyword to distinguish pattern-matching from destructuring in contexts like variable assignment, when we add pattern matching there. but that's not connected to the question of how irrefutable matchers are spelled, afaict?)
